Class SmallCar

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractCar
      • SmallCar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Car

    public class SmallCar
extends AbstractCar
    SmallCar fields and behaviour. Implements unique tank capacity, consumption rates, and drive method.

    • Method Summary

      int drive(int distanceInKM)
      A drive method for SmallCars.

      • Methods inherited from class AbstractCar

    • Method Detail

      • drive

        public int drive(int distanceInKM)
        A drive method for SmallCars. If the tank is not empty, it will decrement the fuelAmount of the car by the distanceInKM param. The amount of fuel used is returned. Returns -1 if the car was not driven (i.e. fuel remaining was less than 1 before driving).
        Specified by:
        drive in interface Car
        Specified by:
        drive in class AbstractCar
        Parameters:
        distanceInKM - The distance to be driven (Kilometers)
        Returns:
        The amount of fuel used during the journey (Litres)
